Package colony

Package that gives the methods and utilities to perform a simulation of a specific population.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GraphInterface
    Interface for the graph, where are define the methods implemented in the Graph Package.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ant
    Class Ant that identifies an ant, its path and the weight of its path
    Colony
    Class which defines the colony.
    EvaporationEdge
    Class which defines an evaporation event for this specific population simulation and triggers it
    MoveAnt
    Class which defines a move event for this specific population simulation and triggers it
    ObservationState
    Class which defines an observation event and triggers it
    SimulationColony
    Class which manages the colony simulation.
    UpdateEvaporation
    Class that will handle the evaporation updates on a specific edge.
    UpdateMoveAnt
    Class which handle the movement of the ants in the colony

Package colony Description

Package that gives the methods and utilities to perform a simulation of a specific population. In this specific implementation the population is a colony of ants, that can move around a map (nodes of a graph). Also the ants can drop pheromones in the edges to give a trail of an ant's path. The graph used is implemented using and GraphInterface interface.
Author:
Pedro Mendes, Rui Livramento, Francisco Costa
See Also:
